title: Offline-First Concepts
description: Test your understanding of offline-first principles.

questions.question: In a local-first architecture, what is the source of truth for the UI?
questions.explanation: In local-first architecture, the local database is the source of truth for the UI. Changes are written locally first and synced to the server in the background.

questions.question: Which sync strategy would you use for collaborative document editing?
questions.explanation: Collaborative documents need sophisticated conflict resolution. CRDTs or merge strategies can intelligently combine changes from multiple users.
